name: Finding Your Roots
description:
A tiny sunflower seed platforms its way on a journey to find a place to grow

Finding Your Roots is a platforming game developed during the 2023 Global Game Jam.

Over 48 hours and following the jam theme "Roots", our small team of 3 designers put together this fun little game about a sunflower seed finding somewhere to plant its roots.

Information:
Mouse and Keyboard control only.
